com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class LegoMindstormsNxtSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsNxtBase
        • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsNxtSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothConnectionListener, Component, Deleteable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NxtColorSensor, NxtLightSensor, NxtSoundSensor, NxtTouchSensor, NxtUltrasonicSensor

    public abstract class LegoMindstormsNxtSensor
extends LegoMindstormsNxtBase
    A base class for components that can retrieve data from a sensor on a LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT robot.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)
